page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO PLYMTREE
page.content: Plymtree is tucked away between Cullompton and Honiton. There is no main road through it. But it is quite active. It isn't huddled together, it is spread out. There are quite a few farms in Plymtree. There is a Post Office near the Church. There is a School, which is very active, and a Hall. Hopefully we will soon get a play area near the Chapel. Next to the Post Office is a Public House. We have a Bus Service, Telephone Exchange, Hairdressers, Doctors, Saddlers, and a Sewage Works. There is 'Car and Commercials', a Garage. Most of the children in the village go to the School, and take part in all its activities.
